tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE student_interactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_content_interaction BOOLEAN,
    discussion_forum_interaction BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE forum_discussions (
    discussion_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    discussion_topic VARCHAR(100),
    discussion_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE students (student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name VARCHAR,
  student_email VARCHAR,
  enrolled_courses JSONB,
  last_interaction TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE courses (course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR,
  course_description TEXT,
  course_instructor VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE interactions (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT REFERENCES students(student_id),
  course_id INT REFERENCES courses(course_id),
  interaction_type VARCHAR,
  interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE content_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    interaction_type STRING,
    interaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE forum_interactions (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    post_content STRING,
    post_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE course_content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    content_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    content_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES courses(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE forum_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    post_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    post_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES courses(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE post_likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    like_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES forum_posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id)
);
